docs.overview:
# Badge

Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge.
docs.api:
# API Reference

[z-badge] Component

| Property | Description | Type                                             | Default   |
| -------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------ | --------- |
| `zType`  | Badge type  | `default \| secondary \| destructive \| outline` | `default` |
| `zShape` | Badge shape | `default \| square \| pill`                      | `default` |
